nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: What Is a Sith Warrior?

Star Wars: The Clone Wars: What Is a Sith Warrior? is a Star Wars Legends reference book based on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. It was written by Glenn Dakin and published by DK Publishing on December 24, 2012.

Step into the exciting world of the Clone Wars! With dynamic interactive text and an exciting new design, DK's Star Wars series brings the world of the Clone Wars alive in a new way for young readers. Now parents and teachers can promote reading with books kids want to pick up — and won't want to put down!

What makes Sith lightsabers red? How does a Sith choose an apprentice? Whose side are the Sith on in the Clone Wars? In this interactive guide, readers will discover answers to these questions, along with more about the sinister Darth Maul and other terrifying creatures from the dark side.
